content: double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into next chain-space 1 chain skip 5 st 2 double_crochet 1 chain 2 double_crochet into next chain-space 2 chain skip 5 st* repeat from until the last group of 3 double_crochet below 1 fpdc 2 chain skip 3 st 1 double_crochet 1 chain intonext st twice 1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet into last st stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 48 double_crochet + 43 chain + 6 fpdc per side + 2 chain in the middle 25th row same as 8th row stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 101 double_crochet per side + 2 chain in the middle 26th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 2 double_crochet into 1st st 1 bpdc into each st until the middle ch2-space 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet middle 1 bpdc into each st until the 2nd last st 2 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet into last st important note on this row it s just like the 5th row but the stitches are bpdc instead of fpdc stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 4 double_crochet + 101 bpdc per side + 2 chain in the middle 27th row same as 7th row stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 55 double_crochet + 54 chain per side + 2 chain in the middle 28th row same as 8th row stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 113 double_crochet per side + 2 chain in the middle row 29th to 44th repeat row 9 to 24 45th row same as 8th row stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 181 double_crochet per side + 2 chain in the middle 46th row same as 26th row stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 4 double_crochet + 181 bpdc per side + 2 chain in the middle reduced version if you are using a 1000m yarn cake you might need to make the reduced version of the pattern depending on your gauge in this case you need to repeat the 8th row one more time stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 189 double_crochet and go directly to the edging section skipping the seaweed section your 47th row is just an all double_crochet row 20 seaweed section 47th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 2 chain do not skip any st *1 double_crochet 2 chain skip 2 st* repeat from * until the second last st 1 double_crochet 2 chain 1 double_crochet middle 2 chain skip 1 st *1 double_crochet 2 chain skip 2 st* repeat from * until the 2nd last st 1 treble_crochet into last st stitch count 1 treble_crochet + 63 double_crochet + 126 chain per side + 2 chain in the middle 48th row chain 4 counts as 1st treble_crochet 1 double_crochet into 1st st 1 chain * dc3tog 1 chain dc3tog into the next ch2- space 3 double_crochet into the next ch2-space * repeat from * until the 2nd last ch2-space dc3tog 1 chain dc3tog into the last ch2-space 2 double_crochet 2 chain 2 double_crochet middle * dc3tog 1 chain dc3tog into the next ch2-space 3 double_crochet into the next
